bpmnProcessId.description: the BPMN process id to create a process from

processDefinitionKey.description: the unique key of the BPMN process definition to create a process from

processInstanceKey.description: the key of the corresponding process instance

startInstructions.description: Returns a list of start instructions (if available), or an empty list.

variables.description: the variables of this record. Can be empty.

version.description: the version of the BPMN process to create a process from
